original_text: Everyone has turned away from God. All people have become completely bad. Nobody does what is good or kind. There is not even one person who is like that. 3: See Psalm 14:1-3; Psalm 51:1-3. Everyone has turned away from God.
korean_text: 다 치우쳐 함께 무익하게 되고 선을 행하는 자는 없나니 하나도 없도다

sentences.original_text: Everyone has turned away from God
All people have become completely bad
Nobody does what is good or kind
sentences.korean_translation: 아무도 선하거나 친절한 일을 하지 않는다

sentences.original_text: There is not even one person who is like that
Everyone has turned away from God
